parsing_result:
# Button/Dial Setting

Access options for camera controls.

To access control options, press **MENU/OK**, select the !SET UP Icon (SET UP) tab, and choose **BUTTON/DIAL SETTING**.

!Button/Dial Setting Menu

## Focus Lever Setting

Choose the functions performed by pressing the center of the focus stick (focus lever) or by pressing the stick up, down, left, or right.

### Push

| Option            | Description                                                                                                                                   |
|-------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **OFF**           | Pressing the center of the stick has no effect.                                                                                               |
| **EDIT FOCUS AREA** | Press the center of the stick to choose the focus area size. If !Face/Eye Detection Icon FACE/EYE DETECTION SETTING or SUBJECT DETECTION SETTING is on, you can instead position the focus frame over the desired face, eye, animal, or object. |
| **ZOOM**          | Press the center of the stick to zoom in on the active focus area (page 90).                                                                  |
| **RESET TO CENTER** | Press the center of the stick to select the center focus area.                                                                               |

### Tilt

| Option                     | Description                                                                                     |
|----------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **OFF**                    | Pressing the stick up, down, left, or right has no effect.                                      |
| **DIRECT AF POINT SELECTION** | Choose the focus area without leaving the shooting display.                                    |
| **EDIT FOCUS AREA**        | Press the stick up, down, left, or right to view a focus-area display and choose the focus area. |
